content: A few of the teams that I work with at Docker, Inc are hiring! Check out our open roles:- Sr. Product Manager (Ecosystem) - https://www.docker.com/career-openings/?ashby_jid=e95fc6b1-9ee5-403d-9174-6f275d51f28a- Sr. Product Manager (Software Supply Chain) - https://www.docker.com/career-openings/?ashby_jid=fa2762ed-2aec-474e-9d83-ab9a4d3f4184- Sr. Data Analyst Product - Ecosystem - https://www.docker.com/career-openings/?ashby_jid=c1d9496e-bbfe-45be-afa8-04d23b48f16c#docker #containers #product #hiring #data

We are hiring! Looking for a statistical programmer / data analyst to work on a NIH R01-funded project using Medicaid data.More details below. We are looking for someone with experience in SAS and/or Stata, training in biostatistics, epidemiology, economics, statistics, or a related field.Experience accessing and analyzing administrative claims data, particularly CMS data, is a plus. #hiring #hiringnow #datascience #data #statisticshttps://partners.taleo.net/careersection/ghc/jobdetail.ftl?job=3230597&tz=GMT-05%3A00&tzname=America%2FNew_York
